description:
Flame Haze. Rebecca is an old friend of Wilhelmina. She has a strong sense of duty as as she chose to help Wilhelmina in her quest to save Shana instead of aiding the Outlaw branch at Tokyo. She is rowdy and that explosive part of her personality is manifested in her Flame Haze ability to shoot explosive bursts of Existence or being able to blow something up from underneath by remote explosion. She is bound to Balar.
Source: Wiki
name: Rebecca Reed
